info.register: You don't have an account yet? Register a new account

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 4 characters.
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.minlength: Your email is required to be at least 5 characters.
email.maxlength: Your email cannot be longer than 50 characters.

validation.minlength: This field is required to be at least {{ min }} characters.
validation.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than {{ max }} characters.
validation.min: This field should be at least {{ min }}.
validation.max: This field cannot be more than {{ max }}.
validation.minbytes: This field should be at least {{ min }} bytes.
validation.maxbytes: This field cannot be more than {{ max }} bytes.
validation.pattern: This field should follow pattern for {{ pattern }}.
validation.number: This field should be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.

error.Size: Field {{ fieldName }} does not meet min/max size requirements!
error.idexists: A new {{ entityName }} cannot already have an ID
error.namespaceExist: Exist other Namespace with the same namespace value
error.featureExist: Exist other Feature with the same featureType and schemaPrefix
error.notCapacityToAddNamespace: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Organization to add a new Namespace
error.notCapacityToModifyNamespace: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Organization to modify a Namespace
error.notCapacityToDeleteNamespace: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Organization to delete a Namespace
error.notCapacityToAddOrganizationMember: It is necessary to be Admin in the Organization to add user's capacities
error.notCapacityToModifyOrganizationMember: It is necessary to be Admin in the Organization to modify user's capacities
error.notCapacityToDeleteOrganizationMember: It is necessary to be Admin in the Organization to remove User's capacities
error.userIsMemberOfOrganization: User is already part of the organization
error.notCapacityToModifyOrganization: It is necessary to be Admin in the Oganization to modify its details
error.notCapacityToDeleteOrganization: It is necessary to be Admin in the Organization to delete it
error.notCapacityToAddFeature: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Organization of its Namespace to add a Feature
error.notCapacityToModifyFeature: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Organization of its Namespace to modify a Feature
error.notCapacityToDeleteFeature: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Organization of its Namespace to delete a Feature
error.notCapacityToAddChange: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Organization of its Namespace to add a Change
error.notCapacityToModifyChange: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Organization of its Namespace to modify a Change
error.notCapacityToDeleteChange: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Organization of its Namespace to delete a Change
error.notCapacityToAddPersistentIdentifier: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Oragnization to add a new Persistent Identifier
error.notCapacityToModifyPersistentIdentifier: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Oragnization to modify a Persistent Identifier
error.notCapacityToDeletePersistentIdentifier: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Oragnization to delete a Persistent Identifier
error.notCapacityForCSVLoad: It is necessary to be Admin or Editor in the Organization of its Namespace to load CSV
error.notAuthenticated: You must be authenticated to do this action
error.taskInExecuting: The namespace has a executing task
